mapper.select: SELECT SlMstCertItem.CERT_ID AS certId, SlMstCertItem.CERT_ITEM_ID AS certItemId, SlMstCertItem.CERT_ITEM_NAME AS certItemName, SlMstCertItem.SORT AS sort FROM SL_MST_CERT_ITEM SlMstCertItem WHERE SlMstCertItem.CERT_ID = #{filterMap.certId} AND SlMstCertItem.DEL_FLG = 0 ORDER BY SlMstCertItem.CERT_ID ASC
SELECT SlMstCert.CERT_ID AS certId, SlMstCert.CERT_NAME AS certName FROM SL_MST_CERT SlMstCert WHERE SlMstCert.CERT_ID = #{filterMap.certId} AND SlMstCert.DEL_FLG = 0
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(slEpCert.CERT_SEQ) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(slEpCert.CERT_SEQ)+1 END AS certSeq FROM SL_EP_CERT slEpCert WHERE slEpCert.EP_ID = #{filterMap.epId}

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(slEpCertItem.CERT_ITEM_SEQ) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(slEpCertItem.CERT_ITEM_SEQ)+1 END AS certItemSeq FROM SL_EP_CERT_ITEM slEpCertItem WHERE slEpCertItem.EP_ID = #{filterMap.epId} AND slEpCertItem.CERT_SEQ=#{filterMap.certSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SL_EP_CERT (EP_ID, CERT_SEQ, CERT_ID, CERT_NAME, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER) VALUES (#{epId}, #{certSeq}, #{certId}, #{certName},0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime},1)

INSERT INTO SL_EP_CERT_ITEM (EP_ID, CERT_SEQ, CERT_ITEM_SEQ, CERT_ID, CERT_ITEM_ID, CERT_ITEM_NAME, CERT_ITEM_VALUE, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER) VALUES (#{epId}, #{certSeq}, #{certItemSeq}, #{certId}, #{certItemId}, #{certItemName}, #{certItemValue},0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime},1)
